casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the GUARDIANSHIP OF the Estate of Wilfred Richard-James BOSSERMAN. William K. Errico ; and William Errico & Associates, P.C., Appellants,
v.
Sandra Stahl, as Successor Guardian of the Estate of Wilfred Richard-James Bosserman, Respondent. No. 76698 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 31, 2019

DISMISSED.
